section.p: The overseer of the mines is a fat, cruel-looking man. He welcomes you with a promise, ‘In one month, you’ll be dead, slave.’

You spend the next few weeks in chains, working 15 hours a day, deep underground, digging at a rock face in the tunnels of the mines in the Bronze Hills. You are fed on gruel and black bread. You realize you will not live long down here and that you must escape if you are to survive.
